channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- Mate 9 Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- Mate 9 Pro

item.title: CVE-2019-5217|2024-08-04T19:47:56.796Z -- huawei -- mate%209%20pro
item.description: There is an information disclosure vulnerability on Mate 9 Pro Huawei smartphones versions earlier than LON-AL00B9.0.1.150 (C00E61R1P8T8). An attacker could view the photos after a series of operations without unlocking the screen lock. Successful exploit could cause an information disclosure condition.

item.title: CVE-2019-5244|2024-08-04T19:47:56.745Z -- huawei -- mate%209%20pro
item.description: Mate 9 Pro Huawei smartphones earlier than LON-L29C 8.0.0.361(C636) versions have an information leak vulnerability due to the lack of input validation. An attacker tricks the user who has root privilege to install an application on the smart phone, and the application can read some process information, which may cause sensitive information leak.
